record.description: [Photographic copy of a drawing] of the combined John Crerar and Illinois Institute of Technology Libraries that will be housed in this modern 80,000 square-foot public library. It will be located in the center of the Illinois Tech campus, and will cost between $1,5000,000 and $2,000,000. The library will contain two sections, one for the combined Crerar-Illinois Tech collection of engineering, scientific books, and periodicals, and the other for Illinois Tech's library of arts, humanities, and social literature.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
